nodes.name: Manual Trigger
nodes.notes: Click to test the full flow. Bypasses the Random Delay and uses the hardcoded phone number in Filter Todays Birthdays instead of reading from the Excel sheet.

nodes.name: Random Delay
nodes.notes: Waits a random 1-27 minutes so messages don't always arrive at exactly 6 AM.

nodes.name: Generate IP Candidates
nodes.notes: Add/remove IPs here if your laptop's addresses change.

nodes.name: Beeper Health Check
nodes.notes: Pings each IP on port 23373. continueOnFail lets failed IPs pass through so the next node can pick the live one. Requires Beeper Desktop to be running with Remote Access enabled and the BEEPER_API_KEY environment variable set in n8n.

nodes.name: Select Live Host
nodes.notes: Picks the first IP that returned a valid Beeper API response.

nodes.name: Read Birthday Sheet
nodes.notes:
Configure: 1) Set Google Sheets OAuth2 credential. 2) Paste your Google Sheet URL in the Document field.

Google Sheet columns:
- Name: person's name (used in the birthday message)
- Birthday: supports MM-DD, MM/DD, YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY/MM/DD formats
- Phone: number without the + prefix (e.g. 14155552671). The workflow adds the + automatically since Google Sheets strips it
- Relay: boolean (TRUE/FALSE). If TRUE, sends 'Tell <Name> I said happy birthday!' to the Phone number instead of a direct greeting. Use this when the phone number belongs to someone else (e.g. sending to mom for the kid).
- Dinner: boolean (TRUE/FALSE). If TRUE, sends a follow-up message after 4-12 seconds asking about dinner plans.

nodes.name: Filter Todays Birthdays
nodes.notes: Supports MM-DD, MM/DD, YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY/MM/DD date formats. Skips rows with missing Phone or Birthday. Prepends '+' to phone numbers (Google Sheets strips the +).

nodes.name: Search Chat by Phone
nodes.notes: Searches Beeper for a DM chat matching this phone number. Phone must be in E.164 format (+country code + number) to match correctly.

nodes.name: Extract Chat ID
nodes.notes: Pairs search results with person data from the birthday filter. Picks a random greeting from 8 templates. If Relay is true, sends 'Tell <Name> I said happy birthday!' instead.

nodes.name: Chat Found?
nodes.notes: TRUE: existing chat found, sends message directly. FALSE: no chat found, creates a new chat and sends the message via the Create Chat API.

nodes.name: Send Birthday Message
nodes.notes: Sends the birthday greeting via Beeper Desktop API v1.

nodes.name: Log Birthday Send
nodes.notes: Logs the birthday message send to the 'Log' sheet tab. Configure: set the same Google Sheet URL and OAuth2 credential as 'Read Birthday Sheet'. Create a 'Log' sheet tab with columns: Date, Name, Phone, Type, Message.

nodes.name: Dinner Plans?
nodes.notes: Checks if the Dinner column is TRUE for this person.

nodes.name: Dinner Delay
nodes.notes: Waits a random 4-12 seconds before sending the dinner follow-up so it feels natural.

nodes.name: Send Dinner Message
nodes.notes: Sends a follow-up message asking about dinner plans.

nodes.name: Log Dinner Send
nodes.notes: Logs the dinner follow-up send to the 'Log' sheet tab.

nodes.name: Get Accounts
nodes.notes: Fetches all connected Beeper accounts. Used to get the accountID when creating new chats.

nodes.name: Prepare New Chat
nodes.notes: Picks the accountID for chat creation. Change preferredNetwork to match your primary messaging service (iMessage, WhatsApp, etc.).

nodes.name: Create Chat & Send
nodes.notes: Creates a new Beeper chat with the phone number and sends the birthday message as the first message via the messageText field.

nodes.name: Log New Chat Send
nodes.notes: Logs the new chat birthday send to the 'Log' sheet tab.

nodes.name: New Chat Dinner?
nodes.notes: Checks dinner flag for newly created chats.

nodes.name: New Chat Dinner Delay
nodes.notes: Random 4-12 second delay before dinner follow-up on new chat.

nodes.name: Send New Chat Dinner
nodes.notes: Sends dinner follow-up to the newly created chat.

nodes.name: Log New Chat Dinner Send
nodes.notes: Logs the new chat dinner follow-up send to the 'Log' sheet tab.

nodes.name: Daily 6AM Trigger
nodes.notes: Runs daily at 6 AM. Adjust triggerAtHour for your timezone.

nodes.name: Filter Missed Birthdays
nodes.notes: Checks last 7 days for birthdays that may have been missed. Same date parsing as Filter Todays Birthdays. Outputs matching rows with daysLate field.

nodes.name: Read Sent Log
nodes.notes: Reads all entries from the Sent-log sheet to check which birthdays were already sent.

nodes.name: Find Unsent Birthdays
nodes.notes: Cross-references missed birthdays with the Sent-log. Filters out anyone who already received a birthday message in the last 8 days.

nodes.name: Search Missed Chat
nodes.notes: Searches Beeper for a DM chat matching the missed birthday person's phone number.

nodes.name: Extract Missed Chat ID
nodes.notes: Pairs search results with missed birthday data. Picks a random belated greeting from 6 templates. No dinner follow-up for late birthdays.

nodes.name: Missed Chat Found?
nodes.notes: TRUE: existing chat found, sends late birthday directly. FALSE: creates a new chat and sends the late birthday message.

nodes.name: Send Late Birthday
nodes.notes: Sends the belated birthday greeting to an existing Beeper chat.

nodes.name: Log Late Birthday Send
nodes.notes: Logs the late birthday send to the Sent-log sheet.

nodes.name: Prepare Missed New Chat
nodes.notes: Picks the accountID for new chat creation for missed birthdays. Uses the same preferred network as the main flow.

nodes.name: Create Missed Chat
nodes.notes: Creates a new Beeper chat with the phone number. Does not send a message â€” that happens in the next node.

nodes.name: Log Missed New Chat Send
nodes.notes: Logs the late birthday new chat send to the Sent-log sheet.

nodes.name: Send Missed Birthday Message
nodes.notes: Sends the belated birthday message to the newly created chat.
